response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item holds significant value to us, reflecting years of dedication and innovation. We are now extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. We believe that this offer presents a unique chance for you to own a piece that not only meets but exceeds your expectations in terms of quality and utility. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless and personalized experience tailored to your needs. Please let us know your decision soon so we can proceed with your order.", "product_price": 1200000}
